thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Editor - Chicago - Sports Media

title: Editor - Chicago - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: This is a part-time position will require the candidate to edit content for use in various / multiple sports programs, both long form and short form content such as weekly studio based programs, live news and remote programs such as teases, highlights, packages, Voice Overs and Sound On Tape   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
